query: SELECT name, currentStock, salePrice/100 as preco_varejo, wholesalePrice/100 as preco_atacado FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%IPHONE 17%' OR name LIKE '%SAMSUNG S25%' OR name LIKE '%CANETA TOUCH 48%' LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4GH8MCSqhpmNowN.8b38cb53c5b2 --database Yjfe3xkLCJuR2SeJ7FBWQ4 --execute SELECT name, currentStock, salePrice/100 as preco_varejo, wholesalePrice/100 as preco_atacado FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%IPHONE 17%' OR name LIKE '%SAMSUNG S25%' OR name LIKE '%CANETA TOUCH 48%' LIMIT 5;
